anya-e0105n29:1_0: Ācariyo pana imaṁ visuddhimaggapakaraṇaṁ yathāvuttappakārena katvā aññāpi tipiṭakaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n29:1_1: anukkamena akāsi. Kathaṁ? Samantapāsādikaṁ nāma vinayaṭṭhakathaṁ buddhasirittherena
anya-e0105n29:1_2: ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānagharapariveṇe mahānigamassāmino pāsāde
anya-e0105n29:1_3: vasanto akāsi. Sā panesā siripāloti nāmantarassa mahānāmarañño vīsatimavasse (973-bu-va)
anya-e0105n29:1_4: āraddhā ekavīsatimavasse (974-bu-va) niṭṭhānappattā ahosi. Tañca pana karonto mahāmahindattherenābhataṁ
anya-e0105n29:1_5: sīhaḷabhāsāya saṅkhataṁ mahāaṭṭhakathaṁ tassā sarīraṁ katvā mahāpaccarīkurundīsaṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathāhi
anya-e0105n29:1_6: ca gahetabbaṁ gahetvā sīhaḷadīpe yāva vasabharājakālā pākaṭānaṁ porāṇa vinayadharamahātherānaṁ
anya-e0105n29:1_7: vinicchayabhūtaṁ theravādampi pakkhipitvā akāsi. Vuttañhetaṁ samantapāsādikāyaṁ –
anya-e0105n29:4: Vinicchayo aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, yo yuttamatthaṁ apariccajanto;
anya-e0105n29:5: Tatopi antogadhatheravādaṁ, saṁvaṇṇanaṁ samma samārabhissa”nti ca.
anya-e0105n29:19: Rañño sirinivāsassasiriyā nivāsaṭṭhonabhūtassa siripālanāmakassa rañño (vimati, antimaviṭṭhe), siripālayasassino.
anya-e0105n29:23: Ekasaṁvacchareneva, yathā niṭṭhaṁ upāgatā”ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n29:24_3: (724) visuddhimaggopi antamaso chappañcamāsehi niṭṭhāpito bhaveyyāti sakkā ñātuṁ.
anya-e0105n29:24_4: Tasmā yaṁ buddhaghosuppattiyaṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ nissāya “visuddhimaggo ācariyabuddhaghosena
anya-e0105n29:24_5: ekaratteneva tikkhattuṁ likhitvā niṭṭhāpito”ti abhitthutivacanaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ takkārakassa
anya-e0105n29:25_0: Nanu ca imissaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “sumaṅgalavilāsiniya”ntiādinā visesanāmavasena āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ
anya-e0105n29:25_1: atideso dissati pārā. aṭṭha. 1.15, kathamimissā tāhi paṭhamataraṁ katabhāvo veditabboti?
anya-e0105n29:25_3: mahāvihāravāsīhi visesena garukatabhāvato, saṅgītikkamānurūpabhāvato, idheva paripuṇṇanidānakathāpakāsanato,
anya-e0105n29:25_4: nigamane ca paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo sutvā karaṇappakāsanato ṭhapetvā visuddhimaggaṁ
anya-e0105n29:25_5: ayameva paṭhamaṁ katāti veditabbā. Visuddhimagge pana vinayaṭṭhakathāyanti vā vinayaṭṭhakathāsūti
anya-e0105n29:25_6: vā majjhimaṭṭhakathāsūti vā evaṁ sāmaññanāmavaseneva atideso dissati, na samantapāsādikādivisesanāmavasena.
anya-e0105n29:25_7: Tasmāssa sabbapaṭhamaṁ katabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ idhātideso pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n29:25_8: 1.15 imissāpi tatthāti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.8 evaṁ aññamaññātideso pana ācariyassa manasā
anya-e0105n29:25_9: suvavatthitavasena vā sakkā bhavituṁ, apubbācarimapariniṭṭhāpanena vā. Kathaṁ? Ācariyena
anya-e0105n29:25_10: hi visuddhimaggaṁ sabbaso niṭṭhāpetvā samantapāsādikādiṁ ekekamaṭṭhakathaṁ karonteneva
anya-e0105n29:25_11: yattha yattha atthavaṇṇanā vitthārato aññaṭṭhakathāsu pakāsetabbā hoti, tattha tattha
anya-e0105n29:25_12: “imasmiṁ nāma ṭhāne kathessāmī”ti manasā suvavatthitaṁ vavatthapetvā tañca atidisitvā
anya-e0105n29:25_13: yathāvavatthitaṭhānappattakāle taṁ vitthārato kathentena tā katā vā bhaveyyuṁ. Ekekissāya
anya-e0105n29:25_14: vā niṭṭhānāsannappattakāle taṁ ṭhapetvā aññañca aññañca tathā katvā sabbāpi apubbācarimaṁ
anya-e0105n29:25_15: pariniṭṭhāpitā bhaveyyunti evaṁ dvinnaṁ pakārānamaññataravasena ācariyassāṭṭhakathāsu
